page.title: 01Inverkeithing in Fife
page.content:
{Inverkeithing}is a Royal Burgh on the north coast of the Forth estuary, providing major road and rail links to the north.
The new town of{Dalgety Bay,}to the east of Inverkeithing, is only twenty years old, yet is expanding rapidly and already houses seven thousand plus inhabitants.
This area is a major light-industrial centre, containing new 'hi-tech' industries in the electronics field, at{Donibristle Industrial estate.}
Fife has rich farmland, so the area offers the oldest and newest forms of employment.
